articles.title: Post Malone donates 10,000 pairs of custom Crocs to health care workers - Today.com
articles.description: Post Malone has teamed up with Crocs to donate 10,000 pairs of his “Duet Max Clog II” shoes to health care workers across the country. The rapper partnered with the nonprofit Musicians On Call, and they said the gesture is a thank you “for their brave work on…
